Can be 'Daily', 'Twice daily', 'Twice every weekday', 'Every weekday', 'Weekly on day n', 'Every two weeks on day n', 'Monthly on working day before day n of month', 'Monthly on last working day of month', 'Twice a month on 15th and last working day of month', 'Every four weeks on day n'
